docs.title: Welcome to LMC
docs.text: This is the official website for the LMC Minecraft server!

docs.title: 🏗️ Builds
docs.text: Screenshots and descriptions of major server builds and projects.

docs.title: 🛡️ Land Claims
docs.text: Use a golden shovel to claim land. Place a chest for a first claim.

docs.title: 🎥 Claim Tutorial
docs.text: Click the image above or watch on YouTube

docs.title: 🏃 Parkour
docs.text: Challenge yourself with our parkour maps and compete for top times!

docs.title: 📝 Server Rules
docs.text: Be respectful, no griefing, and don't destroy other peoples builds.

docs.title: 🌍 Worlds
docs.text: A list of all available worlds on the LMC server.
